title: Michael Zezas: Pondering a World of Unresolved Trade Issues
description: On today’s podcast, Head of U.S. Public Policy Michael Zezas takes a moment to consider the long-term effects regardless of whether or not the U.S. and China are unable to negotiate a meaningful trade arrangement.
